label: Net sales
definition: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

label: Cost of goods sold and occupancy expenses
definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

label: Gross profit
definition: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

label: Operating expenses
definition: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

label: Operating income (loss)
definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

label: Loss on extinguishment of debt
definition: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

label: Interest expense
definition: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

label: Interest income
definition: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

label: Income tax expense
definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

label: Net income (loss)
definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

label: Weighted-average number of shares—basic
definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

label: Weighted-average number of shares—diluted
definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

label: Earnings (loss) per share—basic
definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

label: Earnings (loss) per share—diluted
definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.
